org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface DxlExporter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DxlExporter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DxlExporter

    public interface DxlExporter
    Author:
    withersp OpenNTF extension to DxlExporter class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setMIMEOption(DxlExporter.MIMEOption option)
      Sets how MIME should be exported, either as DXL or as raw content, using DxlExporter.MIMEOption
      void setRichTextOption(DxlExporter.RichTextOption option)
      Sets how Rich Text should be exported, either as DXL or as raw content, using DxlExporter.RichTextOption

    • Method Detail
